title: Use Custom Visuals in Power BI
excerpt: Watch how you can get customer visuals in Power BI from the marketplace, or use internal custom visuals that you may have within your organization.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube
